backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing the game backend with high score submission/retrieval (top 10), player profile management (kills, headshots, shots, points, level), and XP-based level calculation, protected by role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented feature IDs (realistic pistol, shotgun, and assault rifle weapon view model redesigns) to their source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a human-readable index of what each component, hook, and utility does.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point that defines CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes (colors, radius, chart palette, sidebar) and applies base border and background styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Vite/React app, setting the page title to 'FPS Zombie Shooter' and mounting the React root via /src/main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing top-level screen routing (menu, game, gameover, leaderboard, controls, profile) and passing game result data (score, wave, kills, headshots, shotsFired) between screens.
frontend/src/components/ControlsScreen.t: Static controls reference screen that renders a styled list of all keyboard/mouse bindings in a Borderlands toon aesthetic with a back button.
frontend/src/components/Game/DesertEnvir: Three.js React component that renders the full desert game environment including procedurally placed intact buildings with windows and trim, palm trees, a Pack-a-Punch machine, mountain barriers, sand, and sky shaders.
frontend/src/components/Game/EnemyMesh.t: Renders 3D toon-shaded enemy meshes (StandardZombie and BossZombie) with animations for walking bob, hit flash, and death fade using React Three Fiber.
frontend/src/components/Game/FirstPerson: Implements first-person player movement with keyboard/mouse input, gravity, jumping, sprinting, and AABB-based collision detection against the environment and obstacles.
frontend/src/components/Game/GameScene.t: Main game scene component that composes all subsystems (enemies, weapons, waves, audio, HUD) and handles raycasting for shooting with headshot detection and damage calculation.
frontend/src/components/Game/HUD.tsx: Renders the in-game heads-up display including health bar, ammo counter, weapon selector, crosshair, score, wave info, kill streak, and points notifications.
frontend/src/components/Game/MountainBar: Procedurally generates and renders a ring of rocky mountain peaks using distorted cone, box, and icosahedron geometries with seeded randomness for a deterministic stone barrier.
frontend/src/components/Game/MuzzleFlash: Displays a brief animated muzzle flash sphere at a given position that fades out over 80ms when the weapon fires.
frontend/src/components/Game/PackAPunchM: Renders an animated 3D Pack-a-Punch upgrade machine in the game arena with tier-based color schemes, pulsing glow effects, screen flicker, and floating particles using React Three Fiber.
frontend/src/components/Game/PalmTree.ts: Procedurally generates a realistic 3D palm tree mesh with a tapered/curved trunk, drooping fronds, and coconut clusters using seeded RNG for deterministic per-tree variation.
frontend/src/components/Game/PauseOverla: Displays a styled full-screen pause menu overlay with a resume button and instructions to unpause the game.
Renders floating, rotating health or ammo pickup items in the 3D scene and handles proximity-based collection by the player.
frontend/src/components/Game/ToonMateria: Provides custom React hooks that create and cache Three.js toon-shaded and outline shader materials for stylized cel-shading effects.
frontend/src/components/Game/WaveOverlay: Displays a UI overlay showing wave countdown, boss warnings, and wave-cleared messages based on the current wave phase state.
frontend/src/components/Game/WeaponViewM: Renders first-person weapon view models (pistol and others) with recoil animation, reload states, and tier-based glow/sparkle upgrade visual effects.
frontend/src/components/GameOver.tsx: Displays the game-over screen with final stats, submits session statistics to the backend for authenticated users, and allows leaderboard score submission.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Renders a styled leaderboard UI showing top player scores and wave numbers, with gold/silver/bronze rank highlights and a loading/empty state, using data from the useLeaderboard hook.
frontend/src/components/MainMenu.tsx: Displays the main menu screen with game title, navigation buttons, and an Internet Identity authentication panel (sign in/out) in the top-right corner.
frontend/src/components/PlayerProfile.ts: Shows the authenticated player's profile including level, XP progress bar, and stat cards, fetched via useGetOrCreateProfile and the level utility functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnemySystem.ts: Manages enemy and pickup state for the game, providing functions to spawn enemies, apply damage with headshot support, track score/points, and emit floating points notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameAudio.ts: Provides memoized callbacks for playing synthesized game sound effects (gunshots by weapon type, zombie sounds, player hit, pickup, and wave events).
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaderboard.ts: React Query hook that fetches high scores from the backend actor and provides a mutation to submit a new score, invalidating the leaderboard cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Re-exports useLeaderboard and provides two hooks: useGetOrCreateProfile (fetches/creates an authenticated player profile) and useUpdateProfile (mutation to update profile with session stats).
frontend/src/hooks/useWaveSystem.ts: Manages wave-based game progression with phases (menu, countdown, active, cleared, gameover), handling countdown timers, enemy spawning parameters, and wave-clear detection based on active enemy count.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeaponSystem.ts: Manages weapon state including firing, reloading, weapon switching, recoil, and upgrade tiers, with keyboard input support and effective damage calculation based on upgrade multipliers.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS defining a Desert Borderlands design system with custom OKLCH color tokens, Bangers/Oswald fonts, and reusable toon-style component classes (buttons, panels, HUD text).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/shaders/sandShader.ts: GLSL shaders for a procedural sand terrain, using value noise for dune displacement in the vertex shader and warm sandy color gradients with stripe patterns in the fragment shader.
frontend/src/shaders/skyShader.ts: GLSL shaders for a desert sky dome, blending burnt orange to deep red-purple from horizon to zenith with a sun glow effect near the horizon.
frontend/src/shaders/toonShader.ts: GLSL shaders implementing Borderlands-style cel shading with 4-step posterized diffuse lighting, rim highlights, hit flash effect, and a solid dark outline pass.
frontend/src/types/enemy.ts: TypeScript interfaces defining Enemy (with health, position, attack, and state flags) and Pickup (health/ammo collectibles) types used in the game.
frontend/src/types/weapon.ts: Defines weapon types, configs, and state interfaces for three weapons (pistol, shotgun, assault rifle), including upgrade cost/damage multiplier constants and per-weapon stat configurations.
frontend/src/utils/audioSynthesis.ts: Provides procedural Web Audio API sound synthesis functions for weapon fire (pistol, shotgun, assault rifle) and zombie growl effects using noise buffers, oscillators, and gain/filter envelopes.
frontend/src/utils/levelSystem.ts: Implements a 1â€“55 level progression system mirroring backend XP thresholds, with helpers to calculate current level, XP boundaries, and percentage progress toward the next level.
frontend/src/utils/proceduralGeometry.ts: Generates deterministic procedural building/ruin/barrier layout data and collision AABBs for the game arena, plus mountain ring segment data for the perimeter barrier, using a seeded RNG.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routes, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens (desert/game color palette, toon-shadow box shadows, Bangers/Oswald fonts, hit-flash and damage-flash keyframes) and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest tracking the current version, feature list, and architectural notes for a 3D RPG/shooter game focused on realistic first-person weapon models with toon shading.
